physical_appearance:The grain focusing scope has a blue body. It comes in a paper box that is white and has blue outlines. The packaging on the box displays the words \u0027mini sight\u0027 as well as \u0027grain focusing for super sharp enlargements\u0027. It also displays the words \u0027high performance\u0027 at its top. The address and name of the manufacturer
 Bestwell Optical \u0026 Instrument Corporation
 is displayed at the top left hand corner of the instruction manual. Also
 there are four images of the grain focuser
 drawn at different angles
 labelled \u0027A\u0027 to \u0027D\u0027. A brief description corresponding to each letter is stated in the buyers\u0027 guide as well
 in single paragraphs.

sgcool_label_text:A grain focuser is a tool used to fine tune the focus of the grains of the negative in photographic film processing. This grain focuser is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.object_work_type: photograph viewing equipment buyers' guides packaging
metadata.title_text: Grain focusing scope with instructions manual
metadata.creator_2: Bestwell Optical & Instrument Corporation P.O. Box 396 Merrick, N.Y. 11566
metadata.physical_appearance: The grain focusing scope has a blue body. It comes in a paper box that is white and has blue outlines. The packaging on the box displays the words 'mini sight' as well as 'grain focusing for super sharp enlargements'. It also displays the words 'high performance' at its top. The address and name of the manufacturer, Bestwell Optical & Instrument Corporation, is displayed at the top left hand corner of the instruction manual. Also, there are four images of the grain focuser, drawn at different angles, labelled 'A' to 'D'. A brief description corresponding to each letter is stated in the buyers' guide as well, in single paragraphs.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: A grain focuser is a tool used to fine tune the focus of the grains of the negative in photographic film processing. This grain focuser is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
